being careful not to twist sts needles when there are too few stitches to fit around the circular needle work 1x1 rib for 4 note if working the half-and-half option continue with crown switch to larger circular needle and work stripe sequence shaping in c2 until end of your choice over next 24 rnds or 25 rnds in the case of juanita continue the stripe sequence as you work the first 4-6 rnds
